meanings.definition: A mound built by termites to house their colony.
meanings.sent1: The termitaria in the savanna provide shelter for the termite colony.
meanings.sent2: We observed several termitaria while on our nature walk.
meanings.sent3: The termitaria decided to throw a party for the termite queen's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The termitaria stood tall like ancient castles in the termite kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The termitaria loomed large against the horizon, a testament to the termites' architectural skills.

meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see many termitaria on display.
meanings.sent2: The researchers found a collection of termitaria in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The termitaria were all lined up neatly, like little termite houses.
meanings.sent4: The termitaria dotted the landscape, resembling tiny termite villages.
meanings.sent5: The termitaria gleamed in the sunlight, a sight to behold for any termite enthusiast.
